features.name: New debugger module.
features.description: Debuger module available for arduino zero pro and m0 pro

features.name: Themes settings enabled
features.description: Now themes can be setted via Themes Settings Window

features.name: Arduino drivers for Windows 10
Fixed Tx and Rx for M0/M0 Pro
features.description: Tx and Rx blinking during serial communication for M0/M0 Pro

features.name: Added 9AXES support for M0/M0 Pro
features.description: Users Have to change the 9AXES address to 0x29 using M0 Pro

features.name: Added TFT support for M0/M0 Pro
Added RTC support for M0/M0 Pro
Added New Arduino Ciao Library
features.description: Arduino Ciao Library allows Linino users to connect to external world

features.name: Ethernet Library support for M0/M0 Pro
Added Arduino.org Caterina source code
features.description: Caterina based bootloader source code now inclued (Caterina-ORG)

features.name: Added build_all_target.sh to build all bootloader *.hex files
Added make clean_all command to clean working directory
Compiler module improved.
uploader module improved.
Enabled SAMD architecture : m0, m0 pro.
Enabled extension manager.
Enabled avr boards: mega, mega adk, ethernet, fio, nano w/ 328.
Open blink example at first run.
Improve ui loading.
Serial monitor responsive ui.
Serial monitor fix end line chars in received messages.
Fix icon now visible in bar for linux version.
